oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bob Billingsley Show demo - San Antonio, Texas
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Bob Billingsley Show demo tape, featuring Bob Billingsley (host), Les Miller (announcer/engineer), and Bobby Lewis (interviewee), recorded in San Antonio, Texas.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Bob Billingsley talks about this recording -- Opening statement (Les Miller) -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Bob Billingsley) -- Billingsley introduces the first tune -- Billingsley talks about Pete Drake and introduces the next tune -- Billingsley talks about this being where a commercial would be, with musical accompaniment if needed -- Billingsley introduces the next tune -- Billingsley talks about Warner Mack and introduces the next tune -- Billingsley talks about a second commercial spot and how they will occasionally feature interviews with country artists -- Billingsley talks with Bobby Lewis about picking up the Lute (incomplete) -- Billingsley talks about Decca recording studios and Donna Odom -- Billingsley talks about Jim Reeves and introduces the next tune -- Billingsley talks about Jimmy Driftwood and Jim Reeves -- Billingsley adds another commercial break and talks about the programming behind his show -- Closing statement (Bob Billingsley) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Les Miller)
